summary: App with a Photos page to upload images and display descriptive text (e.g., T-0 Junkyard-built Power Armor).
architectural_notes: Photos page should support image upload plus associated description/caption text per photo/item.

existing_features.title: Add a new entry on the existing Photos page (/photo) for the “T-0 Junkyard-built Power Armor” that displays the user-provided image file ("junkyard power armor t-2.png") and a well-written English description paragraph (or short multi-paragraph description) of the armor, matching the existing copper-themed Card layout used for the T-10 entry.

Implement an image upload UI on the Photos page that lets an authenticated user select an image file, preview it locally, upload it to the existing backend blob upload API, and then display the uploaded image(s) on the Photos page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ability to upload a photo to the Photos page and include a written description for the T-0 Junkyard-built Power Armor entry.

projectName: Add T-0 Junkyard-built Power Armor photo + description to Photos page and enable uploads
